errorChatMessage: There was an error with your request. Please try again.
clearHistoryDescription: This will permanently delete your thread history and remove your data from our servers.
shareLinkDescription: Anyone with the URL will be able to view the shared thread.
thisWillPermanentlyDeleteYourChatMessage: This will permanently delete your thread message and remove your data from our servers.
create_thread_description: Create a new thread to chat with your agent.
collections_description: Select the knowledge bases you want to use for this thread.
name: Name

examples.example_message_1: What are the steps to process a refund for a customer using our payment system?
examples.example_message_2: Can you provide an update on the rollout of our new contactless payment terminals?
examples.example_message_3: What's the procedure for handling a declined transaction and assisting the customer?
examples.example_message_4: What are the latest security measures implemented for our online payment gateway?
